author: AP
title: Oklahoma State's Mike Gundy apologizes for COVID-19 comments
description: Oklahoma State football coach Mike Gundy has apologized for comments this week about the COVID-19 pandemic
content:
STILLWATER, Okla. (AP) — Oklahoma State football coach Mike Gundy apologized Saturday for comments this week about the COVID-19 pandemic.
“I have been made aware that comments from my press conference have offended some,” Gundy said in a statement. “It was n… [+2755 chars]
